title: Activity-Based Theological Education Curriculum Design: Applying Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Designing a theology curriculum applying activity-based learning techniques in a mobile learning environment using digital devices, with a focus on enabling learners to acquire practical knowledge applicable to real-world contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain theological concepts using five activity-based learning techniques.
Learners complete over 80% of ten microlearning contents provided via mobile platforms and pass quizzes.
Learners can diagnose their theological understanding using a 3-level scale through peer and self-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
